ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: He s level 35 or so, and he gets killed even more often than I do :) ... From: Kimes, Dean W.  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
He's level 35 or so, and he gets killed even more often than I do :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 10:23 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust.....


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> What level is Meldrath? Is he getting camped often nowadays? I know he
was
> pretty much ignored when I was in that area way back in summer under
another
> guise.
>
> Leagnomo
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Malcolm O'Callaghan [mailto:malcolmo@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:25 AM
> To: 'EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Diamond Dust.....
>
>
> From: Malcolm O'Callaghan <malcolmo@...>
>
> If its a level 50 mob, my guess would be the dinosaur in OOT.
>
> It would have to be a little camped level 50 and this is the only one I
can
> think of, unless the big shark in Lake Rathe is level 50. I would look
> toward big mobs that have no know special drop.
>
> -hax
>
